00008 void Print(Stack<float> bil,Stack<string>operatorx){
00009         cout<<"Stack bilangan"<<endl;
00010         for(int i = 0;i<=bil.getDataCount()-1;i++)
00011         {
00012                 cout<<i<<"). "<<bil.getData(i)<<endl;
00013         }
00014         cout<<"Stack operator"<<endl;
00015         for(int j = 0;j<=operatorx.getDataCount()-1;j++)
00016         {
00017                 cout<<j<<"). "<<operatorx.getData(j)<<endl;
00018         }
00019 }

00021 void SmallCalculate(Stack<float> &bil,Stack<string> &operatorx)
00022 {
00023         float popbil1;
00024         float popbil2;
00025         string dumpoperator;
00026         float dumpbil;
00027         popbil1 = bil.getLastData();
00028         bil>>dumpbil;
00029         popbil2 = bil.getLastData();
00030         bil>>dumpbil;
00031         string popoperator = operatorx.getLastData();
00032         operatorx>>dumpoperator;
00033         if(popoperator == "*")
00034         {
00035                 bil<< popbil2*popbil1;
00036         }
00037         else if(popoperator == "/")
00038         {
00039                 bil<< popbil2/popbil1;
00040         }
00041         else if(popoperator == "%")
00042         {       
00043                 int tempint1 = (int) floor(popbil1 + 0.5);
00044                 int tempint2 = (int) floor(popbil2 + 0.5);
00045                 float hasil = (float)(tempint2%tempint1);
00046                 bil<< hasil;
00047         }
00048         
00049         else if(popoperator == "+")
00050         {
00051                 bil<< popbil2+popbil1;
00052         }
00053         else if(popoperator == "-")
00054         {
00055                 bil<< popbil2-popbil1;
00056         }
00057 }
